page.title: 02INCHMARLO HOUSE
page.content: Inchmarlo House, a listed{Georgian {building, }was formerly the Laird's house on the estate of the same name. It has beautiful woodland {gardens}and formal walled {gardens }adjoining it. At present over 120 homes are being built in the grounds for people of retirement age. The large house will be renovated to form a{health care} and administration block. A bar,restaurant, lounges and community facilities block are also being constructed to create an almost self_contained community for the elderly in remarkably attractive surroundings. Inchmarlo will therefore be catering for some of Britain's growing number of older people requiring a small, easily kept home of their own with the added security of staff at hand to help when an emergency occurs.
